name: Miami Innovation Fund
tag_list: fund, investor, investment, capital, finance, patent, media, mobile, technology, science, telecomunication, innovation
overview:
Miami Innovation Fund is an accredited private investors fostering very early-stage technology innovation and growth in Miami-Dade County.

Miami Innovation Fund is tranche-oriented investments focused on micro-seed, pre-seed, and seed stage capital stage companies, prospectively preparing them for their 1st round of angel financing.

Miami Innovation Fund provides equity financing for promising growth businesses with novel, often patentable technologies, specializing in information technology, interactive marketing and media, telecommunications, including all mobile device applications, business service and application software across most vertical industries.
